review: Picked one up on a whim when they introduced them to prime members at half off, even though I already had a Chromecast.I now want to throw my Chromecast into the nearest ocean.  This fireTV stick is the absolute dog's danglies.  Fast with great UI.  Love having a remote, because a remote never spontaneously forgets that it's controlling what you watch on the TV (YEAH I SAID IT, CHROMECAST).My girlfriend has one of those new Roku cubes, and while nice enough, doesn't stack up in my opinion.I would happily pay 39 for this all day long. If you disagree you are a flawed individual and that's okay, everyone is a unique snowflake, but you are the one who has to live with being wrong.

review: I installed this on an older (dumb) TV for my grandson to watch his kids shows on. In less than 5 minutes I was watching Amazon Prime videos and that included plugging the TV and the Fire Stick in. It comes pre configured with the family Amazon account information already entered. A quick download and I was logged into my Netflix account. I installed parental controls and adjusted the account settings so my grandson can't do any in-app purchasing.The user interface of the Fire TV Stick is clean and intuitive and the remote clutter free, unlike my new TV who's remove has about a thousand buttons.If you are using a "dumb" TV or are just not near a cable connection the Fire TV Stick is a great way to extend the TVs  usefulness in your household.
